channel.title: U-Rune 2.0
channel.description:
[center]The base is KRC update 2.0[/center]
[March 27-2009] I have chosen to make this server not a PK server. I'm hoping the server turns out great, because I have a TON of ideas coming to this server.
Videos [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xjlv9k1sIOU&feature=channel_page][HD] Perfect item pickup. (item on ground)[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oRMDFRrNUjY&feature=channel_page][HD] Jad updated.[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8qUI98k0RaM&feature=channel_page][HD] Almost flawless prayer switching (few problems)[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RRSxYIBB0oI&feature=channel_page][HD] Evil Bob's random event[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q6k2FeBQKpI&feature=channel_page][HD] Monkey guard agression[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W3KSkVFxlJg&feature=channel_page][HD] PVE Footage[/url]
There's alot more in the server, but videos are just more entertaining.
[size=13pt][b][url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342861.msg2649661.html#msg2649661]U-Rune 1.0[/url][/b][/size]

item.title: U-Rune 2.0
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

[quote=“Girona, post:81, topic:268349”]I am talking about Kihomura’s 1st unstable, peice of junk, time-wasting release.
I was looking for the download post but hell he has about 77 pages of posts, and on the 75th or so I found this, a preview.

It wasn’t clean, it was a messy pile of junk.

Preview of the server I am talking about, also, please don’t post in it as you may not of noticed the post was made at August, 2008[/quote]

I completely forgot about that… yeah it was a pile of shit. Not compared to my very first server ever.

Edit: Hehe, I didn’t even know conventions.

Read full topic

item.title: U-Rune 2.0
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Girona, post:79, topic:268349”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=354162.msg2769393#msg2769393 date=1241032232]

[quote author=Girona link=topic=354162.msg2769388#msg2769388 date=1241032010]

Nice job, Kihomura.
I’ve seen your videos, they are very nice. I’ve seen previous developments, well… Sorry but your first 2 developments(Releases) were a fail
I forgot what the server name was, and your first client release.

They didn’t fail; you were just too lazy to make something out of it.
[/quote]I don’t work with it, I am just saying what I think, and yes, it was a fail, he even admits they were both failed developments.

Compared to any other Czar source, it was extremely clean.
[/quote]Oh you don’t know what I’m talking about do you.[/quote]
Maybe not. What are you talking about?

Read full topic

item.title: U-Rune 2.0
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Psycotix, post:69, topic:268349”][center]Some real work has been put in the project for these latest updates![/center]

Jad update - hits mega-high without prayer
Evil Bob random event
Prayer switching - almost flawless

Alot of work has been put into the server, if you do not like the ideas/updates or ANYTHING do not flame or spam this topic, it is not wanted. Topic-related only talk beyond this post.

Check out Kihomura’s youtube channel
Check out URuneSyko’s youtube channel

This server is NOT up for download, or released publicly for other players. Don’t bother asking, you will not get the IP.

[sup]Syko - U-Rune[/sup]

Thank you for reading and hope you have enjoyed the videos we have kindly uploaded you for proof of our development :)[/quote]
Kihomura sucks at Jad. He even admitted it on MSN.

Read full topic
